TopicTitle: 1.0 "accidental" reusable lifter for light payloads to 85x85 orbit!

Articles.Content:
So I did this. Oh, and it's a single stage as well. Enjoy!

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/b7RYq)

If only I had Rockomaxes yet. Nice find, amazing about the re-entry. Another tip if you find yourself coming in too fast a lot: add a separately staged 'chute and pop it once your velocity starts dropping during re-entry.
